::DarkMouse:;

She looked at Scorponok.  She had a "Holy MAtrix" look on her face.  
She walked over to him.  She leaned over and whispered,"I don't trust 
this whole thing.  I just want you to know that if anything happens, 
you can have my stereo in my quarters."  She really wanted to tell 
him that she loved him.  but if a listening device was near, she 
didn't want to compromise him.
